contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xalxal |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Autonomous republic]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Nakhichivan Autonomous Republic|Nakhchivan]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name2 =[[Babek Rayon|Babek]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total =552 |population_footnotes ={{citation needed|date=October 2010}} |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=39 |latm=19 |lats=54 |latNS=N |longd=45|longm=27 |longs=25 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xalxal''' (also, '''Xal-xal''', '''Kalkhai''', and '''Khalkhal''') is a village and municipality in the [[Babek Rayon]] of [[Nakhichivan Autonomous Republic|Nakhchivan]], [[Azerbaijan]]. It has a population of 552. == References == {{Reflist}} *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150B403774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Babek Rayon}} [[Category:Populated places in Babek District]] {{Nakhchivan-geo-stub}}
